name: Vegan Pumpkin Blondies - Oilfree
description: Vegan Pumpkin Blondies! Easy Nut Butter Pumpkin Blondies with Pecans and chocolate chips. No Added oil. Nutfree Gluten-free option
recipeIngredient: 1/3 cup pumpkin puree ((pure pumpkin puree, not pumpkin pie filling. Use a well filled 1/3 cup.))
1/3 cup smooth nut butter (such as almond, cashew or peanut)
2 to 3 tbsp sugar ((I usually use a mix of coconut and raw sugar))
3/4 cup flour ((I use a mix of whole wheat and unbleached all purpose))
1/2 to 2/3 cup additions, like chocolate chips, chopped pecans, dried fruit or other nuts or seeds, (plus more for topping)

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl mix in all the wet ingredients until smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl mix in all the wet ingredients until smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: Add 1/2 cup flour and rest of the dry ingredients and mix. The mixture will make a soft cookie dough. Use your hands if needed. Add more flour if needed a tbsp at a time. If the dough is too dry, add a tablespoon of pumpkin puree. Add the chocolate chips and pecans and mix them in.
recipeInstructions.name: Add 1/2 cup flour and rest of the dry ingredients and mix. The mixture will make a soft cookie dough. Use your hands if needed. Add more flour if needed a tbsp at a time. If the dough is too dry, add a tablespoon of pumpkin puree. Add the chocolate chips and pecans and mix them in.

recipeInstructions.text: Press the dough into a lined brownie pan using a spatula to evenly spread. Sprinkle and press some chocolate chips and pecan/nuts on top.
recipeInstructions.name: Press the dough into a lined brownie pan using a spatula to evenly spread. Sprinkle and press some chocolate chips and pecan/nuts on top.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake at 350 degrees F for 21 to 23 minutes. Allow to cool completely and slice.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake at 350 degrees F for 21 to 23 minutes. Allow to cool completely and slice.

recipeInstructions.text: To bake into cookies, chill the dough for 10 minutes, form balls and flatten well on a lined baking sheet. Bake for 10 minutes, a minute less for smalle and a minute longer for larger cookies.
recipeInstructions.name: To bake into cookies, chill the dough for 10 minutes, form balls and flatten well on a lined baking sheet. Bake for 10 minutes, a minute less for smalle and a minute longer for larger cookies.

keywords: easy pumpkin blondies, pumpkin breakfast bars, vegan pumpkin blondies
